# msgraph Provider

The provider allows you to interact with Microsoft Graph.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Default authentication
provider "msgraph" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_version` (String) The Microsoft Graph API version to use, default is v1.0.
